paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: 98–99% of the PVs identified in Ashkenazi Jews are c.68_69delAG and c.5266dupC for BRCA1, and c.5946delT for BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with a high risk of breast and ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is a founder mutation in Ashkenazi Jews.
key_quotes: 98–99% of the PVs identified in Ashkenazi Jews are c.68_69delAG and c.5266dupC for BRCA1, and c.5946delT for BRCA2.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: c.3109C>T is reported as 23% of BRCA1/2 mutations in Southern Chinese.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with a significant risk of breast and ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is prevalent in Southern Chinese populations.
key_quotes: c.3109C>T is reported as 23% of BRCA1/2 mutations in Southern Chinese.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: c.4037delC is reported as 13% of BRCA1/2 mutations in Filipinos.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with a significant risk of breast and ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is prevalent in Filipino populations.
key_quotes: c.4037delC is reported as 13% of BRCA1/2 mutations in Filipinos.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
